comments.body:
nit.
```scala
-        val query = Project(Seq(Symbol("i"), Symbol("p")),
-          Filter(Symbol("p") === 1, logicalRelation)).analyze
+        val query = Project(Seq($"i", $"p"), Filter($"p" === 1, logicalRelation)).analyze
```

Here, I honestly wasn't sure whether I should swap out a Symbol for a Column reference. Where the test code is directly invoking catalyst primitives, I generally left it with a more conservative change, to just swap in Symbol. I imagine that a Column reference here could be fine too, but wanted to limit the scope of the change.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +67,71 @@        val logicalRelation = LogicalRelation(relation, tableMeta)
        val query = Project(Seq(Symbol("i"), Symbol("p")),
          Filter(Symbol("p") === 1, logicalRelation)).analyze

        val optimized = Optimize.execute(query)
